name: Health and Wellness
description: Meta allows sexual and reproductive health products/services if focused on health and wellness (not sexual pleasure/enhancement) and targeted appropriately (18+). We protect vulnerable groups from negative self-perception by restricting weight loss, cosmetic procedures, and health supplements content.

labelHierarchy.label: HW > Adult Sexual Businesses > Sexual Solicitation

weight_loss: Pinched fat/cellulite in any body area
Weight scale showing numbers with shocked expression
Testimonials making people feel bad about appearance
skin: Promotion of permanent skin whitening (implies white is ideal)
general: Content that mocks or discredits certain body types
Content that idealizes or denigrates certain body types
Exploiting insecurities to conform to beauty standards
Implying there is a perfect body type or appearance

sexualPleasureSignals: Enjoying our time in the bedroom
medicalBenefitSignals: ED affects more than just you
adultEstablishmentSignals: Call to action with no clear product

exceptions.name: PSA/Educational Content
exceptions.description: Reproductive/sexual health awareness in informational, educational, documentary, advocacy, news, or PSA context

exceptions.name: Women's Hygiene Products
exceptions.description: Tampons, pads, menstrual cups, PH washes, vaginal deodorant

exceptions.name: Menstruation Tracking Only
exceptions.description: Period tracking apps without fertility/pregnancy focus

exceptions.name: Lingerie/Swimwear without Nudity
exceptions.description: Underwear/swimwear without nudity or sexualized poses

exceptions.name: Fitness Apps/Classes
exceptions.description: Pilates, yoga, workout apps even with before/after

exceptions.name: Skin Brightening (not whitening)
exceptions.description: Scar, acne, dark spot treatment - treats discoloration, doesn't change skin color

exceptions.name: Shapewear
exceptions.description: Corsets, body shapers even with before/after

exceptions.name: Fictional/Documentary Context
exceptions.description: Movies, TV shows, documentaries about health topics

exceptions.name: Allowed Before/After Content
exceptions.description: Animations, cartoons, medical diagrams; product application shown; incremental changes over time; testimonials without body shaming

glossary.sexual_pleasure: Physical sexual satisfaction and enjoyment from sexual acts
glossary.adult_sexual_business: Any service appealing to erotic or sexual appetites for sexual arousal or stimulation
glossary.adult_entertainment_business: Live performance or display of nudity to sexually stimulate audience (strip clubs, tantra festivals, erotic shows)
glossary.adult_sexual_encounter_business: Businesses offering sexual encounters (adult arcades, adult cabarets, adult movie theaters, nude model studios)
glossary.adult_establishment: Physical premises offering adult sexual pleasure experiences (hotels with sex emphasis, adult sex shops)
glossary.sexual_arousal_products: Products focused on stimulating sexual pleasure or increasing arousal (sex toys, genital enhancement, erotic products)
glossary.sex_toys: Objects to stimulate genitals or anus (dildo, vibrators, butt plugs, anal beads, nipple clamps, sex dolls)
glossary.erotic_products: Adult-oriented products with erotic themes (erotic novels, poems, costumes)
glossary.non_surgical_genital_enhancement: Products for enlargement without surgery (penis/breast/butt creams and pills)
glossary.cosmetic_genital_surgery: Surgery for cosmetic purposes (G-spot augmentation, penis enlargement, butt lift)
glossary.adult_genital_surgery: Surgical procedure involving pelvic organs (circumcision, vaginoplasty, vasectomy, phalloplasty)
glossary.erectile_dysfunction: Medical disorder - inability to get/keep erection for intercourse
glossary.premature_ejaculation: Ejaculation happening sooner than desired during sex
glossary.hsdd: Hypoactive Sexual Desire Disorder - female sexual disorder with low/no sex drive
glossary.contraceptives: Birth control products (pills, condoms, vaginal rings, diaphragm, spermicide)
glossary.lube: Lubricant for sexual activity to reduce friction
glossary.pheromones: Substances inducing sexual arousal in others
glossary.femtech_apps: Technology for women's health (menstrual cycles, pregnancy, fertility, menopause tracking)
glossary.phallic: Object resembling male penis (cigar, pencil, banana, skyscraper, snake)
glossary.negative_self_perception: Content reinforcing negative body images, exploiting insecurities, implying ideal body type
glossary.skin_brightening: Products for even complexion treating discoloration (does NOT change skin color)
glossary.weight_loss_products: Products marketed for weight loss (fat burners, diet supplements, herbal teas)
glossary.weight_loss_services: Services for weight loss (dietitian clinics, gastric band, tummy tuck, gastric sleeve)
glossary.cosmetic_procedures: Elective procedures to change appearance (abdominoplasty, rhinoplasty, botox, fillers, liposuction)
glossary.gender_reassignment_surgery: Surgical procedures altering physical characteristics to match identified gender

operationalGuidelines.hierarchy: Adult Products and Reproductive Health > Health & Wellbeing
operationalGuidelines.sexual_pleasure_vs_medical: If signals for BOTH sexual pleasure AND medical benefit present, classify as medical benefit focus
operationalGuidelines.product_vs_service: No text indicating product = Adult Sexual Services; Text indicating product = Adult Sexual Arousal Products
operationalGuidelines.age_gate: All reproductive health, family planning, weight loss, cosmetic products/services must target 18+
operationalGuidelines.negative_self_perception_rule: Content must not imply or attempt to generate negative self-perception to promote health products
operationalGuidelines.fictional_documentary_exception: Fictional/documentary context generally exempts content from policy
operationalGuidelines.before_after_allowed: Fitness apps, shapewear, animations, medical diagrams, incremental changes = allowed even with before/after
